name: Grasping Strike
text: The surrounding foliage lurches forth at your enemies in concert with your strikes.
prerequisites: Nature Magic or the ability to cast druid or ranger spells; Vital Strike, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks.
benefit:
When you use Vital Strike (or Improved Vital Strike or Greater Vital Strike), you cause the foliage in the area to reach out and entangle your foe (as the condition) if it fails a Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom modifier). The effect lasts for 1 minute or until the enemy breaks free with a successful Strength check or an Escape Artist check (DC = the effect’s saving throw DC), whichever comes first.

You can use this benefit a number of times per day equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). You can choose to use this ability as a free action after you hit the enemy with the attack. This is a supernatural ability.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to increase the DC of the effect by an amount equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 在你的武器之下，枝枝蔓蔓突然开始发疯般的生长，将目标缠住。
prerequisites_zh: 自然魔法（Nature Magic）专长或可以施放游侠或德鲁伊法术；暴击，知识（自然）技能5级。
benefit_zh: 每当你发动一次暴击（或是精通暴击和高等暴击）攻击时，被你击中的生物必须通过一个反射检定（DC=10+你角色等级的一半+你的感知调整值）否则受到周围突然开始生长植物的纠缠，持续1分钟或是目标成功通过一个力量检定或逃脱术检定逃离（DC同效果的检定DC）。你每日可以使用本能力的次数等同于你的感知调整值，你可以在攻击命中目标时以一个自由动作发动这个专长的效果，这是一个超自然能力。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗最多5点耐力来提升这个效果的DC，提升的点数等同于你的消耗的耐力。
